## Hints.HiddenSinglesProvider class

Hint provider for the Hidden Singles technique.

A Hidden Single occurs when a value can only be placed in one cell within a row, column, or 3x3 box, even though that cell may have multiple candidates.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class HiddenSinglesProvider extends BaseHintProvider 
```
**Extends:** [BaseHintProvider](./ts-sudoku-lib.hints.basehintprovider.md)
